which is the one we just solved, say, you then come across a new problem and you have to solve that. And you fix that problem,
you click somewhere else, another new problem. So I find that, uh, the workflow of, um, when I'm working on a machine learning project,
it often feels more like software debugging than software development, right? Because you're often trying to figure out what doesn't work and you're trying to fix that.
